subject: Climate & Environment
title: Waste Incineration
description: Learn Waste Incineration in one minute.

hook.text: Some countries burn their trash instead of burying it. Japan incinerates about 80% of its waste.

buildup.text: Incineration reduces waste volume by up to 90% and can generate electricity from the heat.

discovery.text: Modern incinerators use filters to capture most toxic emissions before they reach the air.
